00018 public class MaxDBDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {

00020     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "SAP DB";
00021     protected Set<String> systemTablesAndViews = new HashSet<String>();

00090     public Set<String> getSystemTablesAndViews() {
00091         return systemTablesAndViews;
00092     }
00093 
00094     public String getProductName() {
00095         return "MaxDB";
00096     }
00097 
00098     public String getTypeName() {
00099         return "maxdb";
00100     }
00101 
00102     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00103         return false;
00104     }
00105 
00106     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00107         return true;
00108     }
00109

00111         return "BOOLEAN";

00113

00115         return "NUMERIC(15, 2)";

00119         return "CHAR(36)";

00142     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00143         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00144     }
00145 
00146     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00147         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sapdb")) {
00148             return "com.sap.dbtech.jdbc.DriverSapDB";
00149         }
00150         return null;
00151     }
00152 
00153     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00154         return "TIMESTAMP";
00155     }
00156 
00157     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00158         return "TRUE";
00159     }
00160 
00161     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00162         return "FALSE";
00163     }
00164 
00165     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {//NOPMD
00166         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();
00167     }
00168 
00169     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00170         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME FROM DOMAIN.SEQUENCES WHERE OWNER = '"
00171                 + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00172     }
00173 
00174     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00175         if (super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00176             return true;
00177         } else if ("DOMAIN".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00178             return true;
00179         } else if ("SYSINFO".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00180             return true;
00181         } else if ("SYSLOADER".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00182             return true;
00183         } else if ("SYSDBA".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00184             return true;
00185         }
00186         return false;
00187     }
00188 
00189     public boolean isSystemView(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00190         if (super.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00191             return true;
00192         } else if ("DOMAIN".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00193             return true;
00194         } else if ("SYSINFO".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00195             return true;
00196         } else if ("SYSLOADER".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00197             return true;
00198         } else if ("SYSDBA".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00199             return true;
00200         }
00201         return false;
00202     }
00203 
00204     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00205         return false;
00206     }
00207 
00208     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00209         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT DEFINITION FROM DOMAIN.VIEWDEFS WHERE upper(VIEWNAME)='" + name.toUpperCase()
00210                 + "' AND OWNER='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00211     }
00212 
00213     public boolean supportsAutoIncrement() {
00214         return false;
00215     }
00216 
00217     public String convertJavaObjectToString(Object value) {
00218         if (value instanceof Boolean) {
00219             if (((Boolean) value)) {
00220                 return this.getTrueBooleanValue();
00221             } else {
00222                 return this.getFalseBooleanValue();
00223             }
00224         } else {
00225             return super.convertJavaObjectToString(value);
00226         }
00227     }
